com.github.brigade.ui.screen.component

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.brigade.ui.screen.component.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Container, DropDown, MapDisplay, Text

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic representation of a GUI component
    Author:
    Matt
